name: Abbey Gore
title: Digital Lead
reasoning: Construction company with digital management role
email_subject: See how Laing O'Rourke can reduce project delays with aerial data
email_body:
Hi Abbey Gore,

I noticed you're attending Digital Construction Week as Digital Lead at Laing O'Rourke. As someone responsible for construction operations, you know how critical accurate project tracking and site visibility are for staying on schedule and budget.

DroneDeploy helps construction teams like yours reduce project delays by up to 30% through automated aerial mapping and progress tracking. We'd love to show you how companies similar to Laing O'Rourke are using our platform to:

• Get real-time project progress updates without site visits
• Identify issues before they become costly delays
• Generate accurate volumetric measurements and cut/fill reports
• Share visual progress reports with stakeholders instantly

We're at Booth #42 with live demos and some great swag. Plus, we're offering free project assessments to attendees.

Would you have 15 minutes to see how this could work for your projects? Just stop by when it's convenient.

Best regards,
[Your name]
DroneDeploy
